Class ItemDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.chmut.giftit.dao.impl.ItemDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dao<java.lang.Long,Item>, ItemDao

    public class ItemDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ItemDao
    The Item dao class provides manipulation of Item entity with database.
    Author:
    Sergei Chmut.
